body: LEAD: Holiday Bazaar Holiday Bazaar School of Sacred Arts, 133 West Fourth Street; 212-475-8048. A benefit bazaar for the School of Sacred Arts will present handmade wares like Tibetan rugs, Islamic scarves, toys from Russia and jewelry from India. body: LEAD: The trouble began at William Howard Taft High School in the Bronx when a sophomore boy threw a piece of chalk at a sophomore girl.
